ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://github.com/kkos/oniguruma/releases/download/v6.9.9/onig-6.9.9.tar.gz
ğŸš echo 60162bd3b9fc6f4886d4c7a07925ffd374167732f55dce8c491bfd9cd818a6cf  onig-6.9.9.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf onig-6.9.9.tar.gz
ğŸš cd onig-6.9.9
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/oniguruma-6.9.9
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
